name: @dictadata/storage-etl
description: Command line ETL utility to transfer and optionally transform data between local and/or distributed sources.
author: Drew O. Letcher

scripts.debug: set LOG_LEVEL=verbose& node --inspect-brk --preserve-symlinks storage-etl.js scan test/config/config-scan-1.json
scripts.test: node storage-etl.js transfer test/data/foofile.json test/output/json_foofile.csv test/transforms.json
